column4: ITT bankruptcy liquidator sues Microsoft in bid to preserve email
column5: The trustee liquidating ITT Educational Services sued Microsoft Corp on Monday to prevent the software giant from destroying data it stores for the bankrupt for-profit college operator  including emails regarding lawsuits pressed by regulators.

column4: Security experts find clues to ransomware worm's lingering risks
column5: (Corrects spelling of first name in paragraph 22 of this May 18 story to Salim from Samil)

column4: CORRECTED-Security experts find clues to ransomware worm's lingering risks
column5: * WannaCry infections still at high levels in China  Russia-report

column4: BRIEF-A German patent court acknowledged receipt of nullity actions filed by Nvidia
column5: * On March 31  A German patent court acknowledged receipt of nullity actions filed by co challenging validity of EP1428225 and DE 1020066043668

column4: UPDATE 1-BlackBerry climbs on hopes for growth in security  autos
column5: TORONTO  May 23 BlackBerry Ltd shares surged to a four-year high in Toronto on Tuesday  extending a two-month rally spurred on by expectations for strong growth in the fast-expanding cyber security and automotive software markets.
